testcase.name: Verify if the place preference values for bing & google
Verify if user is able to see the desired stops
Verify if user is able to see all the available offerings on the app
Verify if user is able to see all the details related to particular offering
Verify if user is able to purchase a shuttl pass
Verify if user is able to see his purchased offering on the app
Verify if user is able to cancel his purchased pass
